entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or rain changing to rain this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
